item.description: Does it ever feel like the internet is slower at night? Did you, like me, assume that the time of day should have nothing to do with internet speed? Today, I would like to explain the following graph, which shows the average and median latency for a large website as experienced by users in South America. By understanding Content Delivery Networks (CDNs), TCP, and stateful HTTP connections better, we will demonstrate why a large portion of websites is indeed slightly slower at night.
